title: Keys???
body: Hello to whoever is reading this, I just wanted to know something, after getting honor 0 can u get higher honors? because I have 6 chests and no keys :/ the only way I have for getting keys would be key shards from higher honors. so thanks if you can help out!

replies.body: You can work your way back up the honor levels.  You just need to keep playing games.

> [{quoted}](name=Lew,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dcktEOpy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-19T11:04:57.674+0000)
>
> You can work your way back up the honor levels.  You just need to keep playing games.

Thanks 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Key fragments won't drop as a result of dropping honor due to behavioral occurrences.  Once you continue playing and level back up, you'll see them appear again!
